name: THE FAVORITE KNOTTED PERFORMANCE HEADBAND // SILVER CHEVRON PRINT
description:
The Favorite Knotted Performance Headband:

Little MAC Threads exclusive, Silver Knotted Headband. 

Made of a luxurious silky organic performance knit jersey. Fabrics are handled with Eco Friendly printing process that utilizes water based inks. 

Sizing: Size A fits up to most 2T
           Size B fits up to most adults



Headbands are made to be adjusted to fit a newborn to adult. They make the perfect accessory to any outfit. 


+ Items are handmade to order please allow 14 days for your order to ship out +

name: BED HEAD  // RAD THREADS TEE COLLECTION
description:
Rad Threads Tee Collection:
 Exclusive Little MAC Threads, "Bed Head" design created with little's in mind. Our designs compliment kids fun lifestyles and big imaginations.

Color: Natural

Graphics: Black and Neon Yellow

Materials: Organic Kids Fine Jersey Short Sleeve


Sizing information: See Sizing Guide

Care Instructions: Love your threads by washing inside out in cold water with like colors and hang-dry or cool dryer settings.

Unisex

+ Items are made to order please allow 14 days for your order to ship out +

name: THE FAVORITE NEWBORN GIFT-SET // OWL TEE-PEE ON PALE PINK
description:
The Favorite Newborn Gift-Set:

Little MAC Threads, Owl Tee-pee Newborn Gift-Set, printed on soft organic cotton knit jersey with water based inks. 

Little MAC Threads, single layered blankets are versatile lightweight and breathable. The perfect go to blanket that can be used for swaddling, napping, nursing, travel and more. This is an essential baby must have that makes the perfect newborn gift.


Blanket measures: 30 in. X 40 in. 

Organic single layered blanket with pattern on one side and natural white cotton on the other. Professional serger  finish. 

Knot Newborn Hat, is adjustable to fit a new wee little baby and will fit up to six months. 

+ This lovely is handmade to order please allow 14 days for your order to ship out +
